scheduler.label: FlowMatch Discrete Scheduler
scheduler.description: The FlowMatch Discrete Scheduler is a scheduler for the LTX2 19B model.

inputs.prompt: The man wearing glasses starts begging for mercy saying "Please! Please don't hit me, I am begging you! I am just a small man!" Before the ogre smiles and smashes him in the face.  The man starts to crawl towards the center of the ring, before the ogre winds up his fist and hits in him the jaw.
